Darkfate::

Darkfate appeared were Drillbit was, and camly answered hi,"Could be  
a good idea let him come in, but we have to be awared... I don't like 
a spy or a enemy free inside the base... We should let your troops 
ready to capture him in case that he did something suspicious."

Darkfate opened his comm link "Chamaleon... free the new two bots if 
the reprogramation process it's done and show them thier quarters... 
I'll speak with them later

"Let's go " said Darkfate to Drillbit"be ready, all could happen"

Darkfate opened his comm link with Megaton"We recive you in few 
seconds"

He look to Drillbit "Let's go"

And he moved towards the main entrace.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard Megaton. He opened a comm to him.
> "This is commander DrillBit. We are preparing to recieve you, please
> hold on."
> He taped a few keys on the computer, putting the base on stand by 
battle
> stations. He then opened a comm to DarkFate.
> "Are you hearing this guy, outside the base? What should we do?"
